name: Greetings, neighbor
description:
2D prototype made in 3 HOURS for Trijam #56.
A lot of desired features, good graphics and sounds are missing but 3 hours are 3 hours. :)

Hold&release space to throw objects,
press R to restart.

Thanks for playing the prototype and reading this! This is an open-source game, if you're interested, source code is available here.
